titleStmt.title: An answere to a certeine booke, written by Maister William Rainolds student of diuinitie in the English colledge at Rhemes, and entituled, A refutation of sundrie reprehensions, cauils, etc. by William Whitaker ...
titleStmt.author: Whitaker, William, 1548-1595.

notesStmt.note: Colophon: Imprinted by Thomas Thomas, printer to the Vniuersitie of Cambridge, 1585.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
